extensionDescription.message: Summarize YouTube videos with chapters using Chrome's built-in AI (Gemini Nano) â€” fully on-device

summarizedButton.description: Button label after summarization is complete

customPromptHeading.message: Ask a question about this video

customPromptPlaceholder.message: e.g., What are the main arguments? (⌘+Enter to send)

summarizerNotSupported.message: Summarizer API is not supported. Please use Chrome 138 or later.

summarizerUnavailable.message: AI model is not available. Please enable it in chrome://flags.

modelDownloading.message: AI model will be downloaded on first use. This may take a few minutes.

noSubtitles.message: This video does not have subtitles/captions available.

noPlayerData.message: Could not read video data. Try refreshing the page.

notYouTube.message: Open a YouTube video to summarize it.
notYouTube.description: Error: not a YouTube watch page

noActiveTab.message: No active tab found. Please try again.

optionsAutoSummarizeHint.message: Automatically summarize when switching to a different YouTube tab while the side panel is open.

shortcutHint.description: Shortcut hint label in side panel

optionsShortcutNotSet.message: No shortcut assigned. Click Change to set one.
optionsShortcutNotSet.description: Message when no shortcut is set

contextMenuSummarize.description: Context menu item to summarize the video

quizDescription.message: Test your understanding — retrieval practice improves long-term retention by up to 50%.
quizDescription.description: Quiz section description based on Roediger & Karpicke (2006)

aiFooterText.message: Powered by Gemini Nano — all processing happens on your device. No data is sent to external servers.
aiFooterText.description: AI privacy info footer in side panel

downloadMarkdown.description: Button to download summary as Markdown file

fullTranscriptHeading.description: Full transcript section heading in Markdown export

optionsPrivacyModel.message: This extension uses Gemini Nano, Chrome's built-in on-device AI model.

optionsPrivacyLocal.message: All processing happens locally on your device

optionsPrivacyNoServer.message: No video data is sent to external servers

optionsPrivacyNoTraining.message: The AI model does not learn from or store your data
optionsPrivacyNoTraining.description: Privacy bullet: no training on user data

optionsPrivacyOffline.message: Works offline after the initial model download
